subject: Football
Organized Labor
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The teams on the lower end of the league’s revenue stream benefit from the fund, which is a tiny fraction of the $6.5 billion that all 32 teams share.
snippet: The teams on the lower end of the league’s revenue stream benefit from the fund, which is a tiny fraction of the $6.5 billion that all 32 teams share.
